original_text: they wandered over all the mountains and on every high hill. My sheep were scattered over all the face of the earth, with none to search or seek for them.
korean_text: 내 양 떼가 모든 산과 높은 멧부리에마다 유리되었고 내 양 떼가 온 지면에 흩어졌으되 찾고 찾는 자가 없었도다

sentences.original_text: they wandered over all the mountains

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 높은 언덕 위에서도 헤맸습니다

sentences.original_text: My sheep were scattered over all the face of the earth
with none to search or seek for them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 찾거나 구하는 자가 아무도 없었습니다
